page.title: 01LANDSCAPE,Yeoford area.
page.content: {Yeoford}is a very small village in the county of {Devon. Devon}is the second largest county. The nearest town to{ {Yeoford}is Crediton and the nearest city is{Exeter.}The area has two hamlets,{Woodland Head}and{Neopardy. There are two rivers, the{Yeo}and {Troney.}Both of these rivers meet at {Yeoford}railway station. There is one school in{Yeoford}and it has forty six pupils. There is one post office. There was a sawmills but they knocked it down and now it's going to be a building site! There is a playing field behind{Yeo View}but this might be demolished if they build in the field behind{Yeo View.}There are sixteen council houses and 6 bungalows at{Yeo View.}There is a Church and a Gospel Hall. There are 26 farms and about 26 tree plantations and there are lovely views everywhere!!!
